trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Peyton
There were no other sightings in Peyton on or around January 14th 2012
Summary: A red ball near the moon
divs: Sighting DetailsThis was a red object in the sky that was next to the moon at the start and went in a circular path around me. It the was followed by a moonstone colored object with the same physical properties and behavior.
